main.name: Shubham Baragi
main.description: I like dabbling in various parts of frontend development and like to learn about new technologies and Iam Passionate Photographer with Photo & Video Edditor
main.bio: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer in building web applications using modern technologies.With expertise in both frontend and backend development, I have worked extensively with the FullStack (MySQL, Express.js, React.js, Node.js).I am proficient in building interactive dashboards, landing pages, and API-driven applications while maintaining best practices in code quality, performance optimization, and user experience. My skill set includes working with relational and non-relational databases (MySQL, MongoDB), deploying applications on cloud platforms like Netlify, and managing data-driven projects with interactive charts and filtering options.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

resume.skillmessage: I am well versed in using React.JS as my main Front end tech stack along with Nodejs and MySQL Database

education.degree: Bachelors of Engineering in Mechanical Engineering

testimonials.text: Clean code always looks like it was written by someone who cares.
